Articles.Content:
Good afternoon and greetings from Poland, land of beautiful women and excellent pilots .

So, say something about me:

I'm student of the electronics technical school, amateur of the astronomy and history. I play Kerbal Space Program for three months and my biggest achievement is probe on the Eve's orbit, many jets stylized on the NATO and Russia planes [MiG, F-16 etc.] and many other Kerbin things and buildings.

Hello Wiarus, and welcome to the forums!

Glad to have you aboard. You'll fit right in since we have a very international community here as well as many, many space and astronomy enthusiasts.

Happy landings!
